channel.description: Recent content in Hosting on Github Pages on thedevopscat blog - t2

item.title: Static Website Hosting on Github - Part 3
item.description: This post covers hosting a Hugo static website on Github Pages with fully automated jamstack workflow and all builds performed by Github Actions.

item.title: Static Website Hosting on Github - Part 2
item.description: This post explores hosting a Hugo static website code on Github repo’s and hosting using Github Pages for website hosting.

item.title: Static Website Hosting on Github - Part 1
item.description: This post covers the basics of hosting a Hugo static website on Github Pages and what would be required to move to Github Pages from Azure Static Web App hosting.
